Uses of Interface
prism.ModelChecker

  • Packages that use ModelChecker 
    Package Description
    prism
    The main Prism API, the command-line tool, and Java classes for symbolic data structures and algorithms.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ModelChecker StateModelChecker.createModelChecker(Model newModel)
      Create a model checker (a subclass of this one) for a given model, deducing the model type and reusing the PropertiesFile and Prism objects of the current model checker.
      ModelChecker Prism.getModelChecker() 
      Methods in prism with parameters of type ModelChecker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression LTLModelChecker.checkMaximalStateFormulas(ModelChecker mc, Model model, Expression expr, java.util.Vector<JDDNode> labelDDs)
      Extract maximal state formula from an LTL path formula, model check them (with passed in model checker) and replace them with ExpressionLabel objects L0, L1, etc.
      DA<java.util.BitSet,? extends AcceptanceOmega> LTLModelChecker.constructDAForLTLFormula(ModelChecker mc, Model model, Expression expr, java.util.Vector<JDDNode> labelDDs, AcceptanceType... allowedAcceptance)
      Construct a deterministic automaton (DA) for an LTL formula, having first extracted maximal state formulas and model checked them with the passed in model checker.
      DA<java.util.BitSet,AcceptanceReach> LTLModelChecker.constructDFAForCosafetyRewardLTL(ModelChecker mc, Model model, Expression expr, java.util.Vector<JDDNode> labelDDs)
      Constructs a deterministic finite automaton (DFA) for the given syntactically co-safe LTL formula, for use in reward computations for co-safe LTL.
